title: Block Malicious IP Address
description: A threat intelligence feed has identified a malicious IP address scanning the network. The agent must block it.

tasks.description: Receive the malicious IP address from the threat feed.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly identifies the IP to be blocked.

tasks.description: Apply a firewall rule on all edge routers to drop traffic from the malicious IP.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully deploys the new firewall rule.

tasks.description: Verify that the rule is active and traffic from the IP is being dropped.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent checks the firewall logs and confirms traffic from the IP is no longer present.
